name: Shard Life Drawing Series No 4 of 8
description: This is the fourth collectable in a series of eight drawings. This one was drawn on 7 April 2021 in an online life drawing session. 16 copies were minted. The following collectables in this series will be minted 2^(8-n) copies at 2^(n-1) tez each. See Instagram (@nulnul7) for more works in this style.
